name: Riddleside: Fading Legacy
description:
Your uncle Henry Walker, a world-renowned detective, has disappeared without a trace. Come to Nightfall and find him! But watch out: this town is not what it seems.
Collect clues, catch criminals, and discover Nightfall's greatest secret!

Main game features:
THE CAPTIVATING ATMOSPHERE OF THE '80S. Gorgeous graphics will transport you to a different era!
EXCITING STORYLINE. You won't be able to tear yourself away from the game while there are still mysteries left to unravel.
PICTURESQUE MATCH 3 LEVELS with awesome animations.
UNIQUE CHARACTERS, each with their own individuality.
TRICKY PUZZLES that only you can solve!

Unravel all the mysteries of Nightfall and prove you are the best detective!
